results.description: The gym honours Slaughtmanus player Kevin King, who died while playing soccer in November 2016.
results.shortTitle: GAA club names gym in memory of late 22 year old
results.title: Slaughtmanus Gaelic Club names gym after former player

results.description: Slaughtneil make it three Ulster club hurling successes in four years with a 1-15 to 0-8 victory over 10-man Dunloy at Pairc Esler.
results.title: Slaughtneil see off Dunloy in Ulster final

thumbnail.altText: Slaughtneil players celebrate Ulster title win

results.description: Slaughtneil are too good for Loughgiel as they win by four points at Pairc Esler to claim their fourth consecutive Ulster club camogie title.
results.title: Slaughtneil defeat Loughgiel in Ulster decider

results.description: Slaughtneil secured their third Ulster club hurling title in four years with a hard-fought eight-point victory over 14-man Dunloy at Pairc Esler.
results.shortTitle: Slaughtneil beat Dunloy to lift title
results.title: Ulster club hurling final: Slaughtneil beat 14-man Dunloy to lift title

results.description: The Tyrone county board is to launch an investigation into a brawl which marred the Division One football league final at the weekend.
results.title: Tyrone to investigate Division One league final brawl

results.description: Slaughtneil secure their fourth consecutive Ulster club camogie title with a four-point victory over Loughgiel at Pairc Esler.
results.shortTitle: Slaughtneil win fourth title in a row
results.title: Ulster club camogie final: Slaughtneil beat Loughgiel to win fourth title in a row

results.description: Slaughtneil manager Michael McShane says his players are unfazed by Dunloy's status as favourites for Sunday's Ulster SHC final.
results.shortTitle: 'We don't worry about favourites tags'- McShane
results.title: 'We don't worry about favourites tags'- Slaughtneil boss McShane

results.description: Crossmaglen legend Oisin McConville says it's time for two referees to be considered for top-level club matches to ease pressure on officials.
results.shortTitle: 'We need to go Aussie Rules style'
results.title: 'We need to go Aussie Rules style' - McConville calls for two referees in club games

results.description: Clontibret will face Naomh Conaill at Omagh on Saturday, 16 November with Derrygonnelly taking on Kilcoo the following day in Armagh.
results.shortTitle: Ulster Club SFC dates & venues announced
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Semi-finals dates and venues announced

thumbnail.altText: Conor McManus celebrates after Clontibret's victory over Crossmaglen on Saturday
Conor McManus celebrates after Clontibret's victory over Crossmaglen on Saturday

results.description: Donegal's 2012 All-Ireland winner Frank McGlynn announces his retirement from inter-county football after a 14-year career.
results.title: Frank McGlynn: Donegal All-Ireland winner announces inter-county retirement

results.description: Derrygonnelly captain Ryan Jones said he had "no idea" that there was going to be extra-time let alone penalties in Sunday's dramatic Ulster Club SFC game against Trillick.
results.shortTitle: 'I didn't know there was extra-time - let alone penalties' - Jones
results.title: 'I didn't know there was extra-time - let alone penalties' - Derrygonnelly skipper Jones

thumbnail.altText: Ryan Jones skippered Derrygonnelly to a dramatic victory over Trillick
Ryan Jones skippered Derrygonnelly to a dramatic victory over Trillick
Ryan Jones skippered Derrygonnelly to a dramatic victory over Trillick
Ryan Jones skippered Derrygonnelly to a dramatic victory over Trillick

results.description: Derrygonnelly become the first team to win a penalty shootout in a senior GAA provincial championship match in club or intercounty football as they overcome Trillick in the Ulster Club SFC.
results.title: Watch Derrygonnelly's historic shootout win in Ulster Club SFC tie

thumbnail.altText: Shane McGullion and his Derrygonnelly team-mates could celebrate after being a part of a piece of GAA history
Shane McGullion and his Derrygonnelly team-mates could celebrate after being a part of a piece of GAA history
Shane McGullion and his Derrygonnelly team-mates could celebrate after being a part of a piece of GAA history
Shane McGullion and his Derrygonnelly team-mates could celebrate after being a part of a piece of GAA history

results.description: Derrygonnelly Harps beat Trillick 6-5 on penalties to reach the Ulster Club SFC semi-finals after the last eight clash finishes 1-17 to 3-11 after extra-time at Brewster Park.
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Derrygonnelly beat Trillick in historic shootout to reach last four

results.description: Kilcoo and Naomh Conaill progress to the Ulster Club Football semi-finals by overcoming Magherafelt and Castlerahan.
results.shortTitle: Kilcoo and Naomh Conaill reach last four
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Kilcoo and Naomh Conaill progress to semi-finals

thumbnail.altText: Jerome Johnston hit Kilcoo's crucial goal against Magherafelt
Jerome Johnston hit Kilcoo's crucial goal against Magherafelt
Jerome Johnston hit Kilcoo's crucial goal against Magherafelt
Jerome Johnston hit Kilcoo's crucial goal against Magherafelt

results.description: John McEntee admits he was conflicted as he managed Clontibret to a one-point victory over his native Crossmaglen in the Ulster Club SFC.
results.shortTitle: 'I'm still a Crossmaglen man but I had to do my best for Clontibret'
results.title: McEntee admits he was conflicted as he managed Clontibret to victory over Crossmaglen

thumbnail.altText: Former Crossmaglen All-Ireland hero John McEntee masterminded Clontibret's victory over his native club
Former Crossmaglen All-Ireland hero John McEntee masterminded Clontibret's victory over his native club
Former Crossmaglen All-Ireland hero John McEntee masterminded Clontibret's victory over his native club

results.description: Monaghan champions Clontibret are through to the Ulster Club SFC semi-final after a 0-10 to 0-9 victory over Crossmaglen Rangers in Armagh.
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Clontibret beat Crossmaglen by a point to reach semi-final

results.description: Join Thomas Niblock and Martin Clarke for the Ulster SFC quarter-final clash from the Athletic Grounds.
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Crossmaglen v Clontibret

results.description: Tyrone duo Ronan McNamee and Cathal McShane and Donegal forward Michael Murphy are the three Ulster representatives in the All-Star football team.
results.shortTitle: Three Ulster players in All-Stars team
results.title: All-Stars 2019: Tyrone duo among three Ulster players in football team of the year

results.description: Clontibret captain Brian Greenan admits the Monaghan champions are 'up against it' as they prepare to face Crossmaglen Rangers in the Ulster Club SFC quarter-final.
results.shortTitle: Clontibret out to down 'old masters' Cross
results.title: Ulster Club SFC: Clontibret out to down 'old masters' Crossmaglen - Greenan

results.description: Naomh Conaill's Donegal SFC winning captain Ciaran Thompson says the club are delighted to get over the line after beating Gaoth Dobhair 0-8 to 0-7 in the second replay to win the Dr Maguire Cup in Ballybofey.
results.shortTitle: 'The last few weeks have been mayhem'
results.title: Donegal SFC: Naomh Conaill thrilled to edge decider after two weeks of 'absolute mayhem' - Thompson
